name: Spell Effect: Sealing Sword of Light

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-misc.our-items.Item.PbymRnpbl8OiTuPN]{Sealing Sword of Light}

If the target is hit and has the unholy trait, they shed bright white light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) for the duration and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as the sword drives itself into the targetâ€™s form and begins sealing it. When you sustain this spell in the following rounds, the target must attempt a @Check[will|against:spell|traits:incapacitation|rollerRole:origin] save (incapacitation). If they fail, the target increases the Slowed condition caused by this spell by 1. If this ever causes the target to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 3} then the target turns to stone with its essence sealed forever within the blade whose hilt remains jutting from the statue left behind. You no longer have to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain} the spell.

The blade can be removed during or after the sealing effect with an interact action that involves either an @Check[athletics|against:spell] or @Check[religion|against:spell] check against your spell DC to succeed thus ending the sealing. When a creature attempts to remove the spike, they take @Damage[11d6[spirit]]{11d6 Spirit Damage}. The DC gains a +4 status bonus if the attempt is made after the target is already sealed.
